ENGLISH: Hello, Jaromir. I'm glad you came to see me off.\| Still sticking to your plan?
ZH-cn: 你好，贾洛米。很高兴你来为我送别。\|你还在坚持你的计划吗？

ENGLISH: ...\| Yes.\| I must, Avatar of Donar.
ZH-cn: ……\|是的。\|我得这么做，多纳尔的化身。

ENGLISH: What the...\| call me \n[8], will ya?!
I hear you, there's a lot of work to be done. You're going to be integral to the rebuilding process in Veridia.
ZH-cn: 我懂的。还有很多事情要做。要重建维尔迪亚，没有你可不行。

ENGLISH: It is not just that, \n[8].\| Since you appeared in our world, my holy covenant has not changed.\! The demonic cult brought undue burden to our homeland. These scars will not heal for some time.\! Adventuring off to the unexplored continent... that is a young one's game.\| But I can still be effective here... as a purveyor of Donar's goodness and glory.\! That some day, we will not need holy wars. Only an unshakeable faith in the true nature of all things to unify this world.
ZH-cn: 还不仅如此，\n[8]。\|你降临在了这个世上，我的圣约才没有改变。\!恶魔般的邪教给我们的家园带来了不应有的创伤。创痛需要时间才能愈合。\!去新大陆冒险……是年轻人的游戏。\|不过我还能在这里传扬多纳尔的福音…继续发挥余热。\!直到某一天，世上不再需要圣战。只剩下对万事万物的坚定信念来连接世界。

ENGLISH: That's...\| that's a lot to put on your shoulders.
ZH-cn: 你……\|你给自己的肩上放了很重的担子啊。

ENGLISH: It is my reason to live.\| I live to be among Donar's greatest soldiers.\! And to protect the legacy of his Avatar, when she is finally ready to return to us.
ZH-cn: 我活着就是为了这个。\|我活着是为了成为多纳尔最得力的干将。\!还要保护好祂的圣灵化身的遗产，直到她终于准备好回来。

ENGLISH: And return I will, Jaromir.\| Thank you for being by my side for this journey.\| I will see you again... but rest assured, Donar will be your partner in crime until then.
ZH-cn: 贾洛米，我会回来的。\|谢谢你站在我的身边，伴我这一程。\|我们还会再见面的……但请放心，在那之前，多纳尔将是你的好伙伴。
